meanings.definition: A path or lane designated for bicycles.
meanings.sent1: The cycleway through the park is perfect for a leisurely bike ride.
meanings.sent2: I always use the cycleway to commute to work safely.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle refuse to use the cycleway? It wanted to take the scenic route!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to fitness was like a cycleway, always leading her in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The bright red paint on the cycleway made it stand out against the green grass.

meanings.definition: A route or track for cycling.
meanings.sent1: The cycleway along the river offers stunning views of the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: We followed the cycleway through the forest, enjoying the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle fall over on the cycleway? It was two-tired!
meanings.sent4: The cycleway of life may have twists and turns, but it's always an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The cycleway snaked through the countryside, inviting cyclists to explore.
